motor.h

00001 // ***************************
00002 // MOTOR FUNCTIONS AND DEFINES
00003 // ***************************
00004 #ifndef MOTOR_H
00005 #define MOTOR_H
00006 #include "driverlib/pwm.h"
00007 
00008 //*****************************************************************************
00009 //
00010 // If building with a C++ compiler, make all of the definitions in this header
00011 // have a C binding.
00012 //
00013 //*****************************************************************************
00014 #ifdef __cplusplus
00015 extern "C"
00016 {
00017 #endif
00018 
00019 typedef signed char power_t;            // motor power data type
00020 
00021 typedef enum {
00022         MOTOR_0 = PWM_OUT_4,                    // MOTOR_0
00023         MOTOR_1 = PWM_OUT_5                             // MOTOR_1
00024         } motor_t;      // motor data type
00025 
00026 // Summary:     Initializes the appropriate PWMs for motor output
00027 // Parameters:
00028 //              invert0:        true if you want to invert MOTOR_0; false otherwise
00029 //              invert1:        true if you want to invert MOTOR_1; false otherwise
00030 // Note:        Always call this function before any other motor-related functions
00031 extern void InitializeMotors(tBoolean invert0, tBoolean invert1);
00032 
00033 // Summary: Sets the specified motor's power
00034 // Parameters:
00035 //              motor:          MOTOR_0 or MOTOR_1
00036 //              power:          sets motor to the specified power.
00037 //                                      0 is neutral, 127 is full forward, -128 is full backward
00038 extern void SetMotorPower(motor_t motor, power_t power);
00039 
00040 // Summary: Sets both motor powers simultaneously
00041 // Parameters:
00042 //              power0:         desired power output for MOTOR_0
00043 //              power1:         desired power output for MOTOR_1
00044 extern void SetMotorPowers(power_t power0, power_t power1);
00045 
00046 //*****************************************************************************
00047 //
00048 // Mark the end of the C bindings section for C++ compilers.
00049 //
00050 //*****************************************************************************
00051 #ifdef __cplusplus
00052 }
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 #endif // MOTOR_H
